short_summary: Stormwater diversion contract at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking offers to provide construction services for Stormwater Diversion at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography (BIO) located in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia. The contracting authority is looking for a lowest price bid from vendors.
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify: Bedford Institute of Oceanography (BIO) - Stormwater Diversion

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4245632385
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-05
* **Closing Date and Time**: 2023-10-20T14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 2

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (Canada)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information**: Kate Mintzer (kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender Information

* **Tender Type**: Invitation to Qualify (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia (Nouvelle-Écosse)

## Notice Description

* **Description**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking construction services for Stormwater Diversion at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography (BIO) in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia.

## Inquiries and Questions

* **Inquiries**: Technical inquiries and contract questions must be submitted in writing to Kate Mintzer at kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Inquiries must be received no later than five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Kate Mintzer
* **Email**: kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17639925](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17639925) ( Français | English ) Please review the solicitation for complete details on the requirement.
